thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 5 of 65
thread.title: Samantha

author: Samantha
title: Samantha
text: Jon Grosse went above and beyond to help us book our trip. He asked great questions and really tried to understand about our group traveling and what we were looking for. He gave us several options and explained why we would like each one. If you are looking to book a trip - definitely call Jon. He will make sure it is the perfect fit for you, your family and friends.
